description: A V10 supercar that screams to 9,000 RPM and sounds like the end of the world. The Tokyo Express is Zenith's ultimate statement â€” a naturally aspirated masterpiece with Formula 1 engineering DNA. Each one was hand-built over six months. Only 500 exist.
lore: When Zenith's engineers set out to build the Tokyo Express, they started with a clean sheet of paper and a single goal: build the best naturally aspirated sports car ever made. The V10 engine was developed with Formula 1 technology, and the exhaust note at 9,000 RPM is something that changes people. You hear it once, and nothing else sounds right ever again.
